summary: This appears to be an email or internal communication from October 7, 2019, listing a series of alleged abusive incidents involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell against a victim in various locations. The document details specific acts of sexual misconduct, manipulation, and the victim's fear.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as the primary perpetrator in multiple incidents of sexual touching, spooning, and receiving foot massages from the victim, often with Ghislaine Maxwell present.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Present during multiple incidents, gave the victim a nude massage, provided instructions on how to perform foot massages for Epstein, and participated in initiating unwanted contact.

connections.description: Acted together in multiple incidents of alleged abuse against the victim, with Maxwell facilitating and participating in the misconduct.
Both are described as perpetrators initiating unwanted physical contact with the victim, leading to the victim's fear of rape.

events.title: Movie Theatre Incident in NYC
events.description: Epstein rubbed the victim's hand and leg in a movie theatre in New York City.

events.title: Foot Massages and Instructions in NM
events.description: In New Mexico, the victim gave foot massages to Epstein with Maxwell providing pointers on how Epstein likes it. Another incident of petting/touching occurred in a movie theatre in NM.

events.title: Bed Incident with Spooning and Touching in NM
events.description: Epstein climbed into bed with the victim for spooning and touching in New Mexico.

events.title: Nude Massage by Maxwell
events.description: Maxwell gave the victim a nude massage in New Mexico; Epstein did not participate but his presence was felt.

events.title: Joint Bed Incident and Victim's Flight
events.description: The victim was on a bed with both Epstein and Maxwell, asked to give a foot massage. Both started unwanted contact, causing the victim to run away fearing rape.

keyFacts: The document lists a chronological series of alleged sexual misconduct by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell against a victim across multiple states.
Specific acts include unwanted touching in movie theatres, instructed foot massages, spooning in bed, and a nude massage administered by Maxwell.
The victim explicitly feared rape during an incident with both Epstein and Maxwell, leading her to run away.
The communication notes that nude photos of the victim are missing, suggesting potential evidence of exploitation.
The document is formatted as an email or memo from October 2019, likely summarizing allegations for legal or investigative purposes.
